IncidentARMId.title: Incident ARM ID

body.Query:
DeviceLogonEvents 
| where Timestamp > ago( @{triggerBody()?['LookbackInDays']}d )
| where LogonType in ("Interactive","RemoteInteractive")
| where AccountSid == "@{variables('UserSid')}"
| distinct DeviceName, DeviceId
